import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Form, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import { AuthProvider, useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' export default function Signup() { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const passwordConfirmRef = useRef() const { signup } = useAuth() const [error, setError] = useState('') function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() if (passwordRef.current.value === passwordConfirmRef.current.value) { return } signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return ( <>

Sign Up
